help.title: :robot: Command help
help.description:
>>> For more help with commands **type `%shelp [command]`**
All bot commands are listed on the site: **[`https://bot.sqdsh.top/en-commands`](https://bot.sqdsh.top/en-commands)**
help.no_description: %s This command doesn't have a description.
error.description.group.no_group:
You didn't provided a group for this action!
Available command groups: `%s`
help.badoo.args:
on/off/status - enable/disable/check status of the channels**
For channels settings, instead of arguments above use arguments below:
> **`parentID/boyChannel/girlChannel <ID of category/channel for boys/channel for girls>`
help.music-data.description: About new current song message sending manage.
help.anti-spam-warns.description: Set a default warn count for ban spammers while join to server.
help.ass.description: Uuuhhhh... Don't ask anything about this command.
help.neko.description: Mmm.. uuh.. You shouldn't use this.
security-info.title: Server security settings
warns.title: Checking a user for spam

error.lyrics.description.no_args: You haven't provided a track name. How can I search lyrics to nothing? >___<

error.bass.description.no_mode: Types of bass can be **`%s`** only!
bass.apply.no_volume:
Bass is activated with effect **%s**. Please wait a few seconds to apply this effect in current queue.

> :information_source: For better effect you can set the volume of music to **200%**.
bass.apply.volume:
Bass is activated with effect **%s**. Please wait a few seconds to apply this effect in current queue.

> :information_source: For better effect I've set the volume of music to **%s%**.
error.loop.description.15000: You can't apply looping to the current track.
error.loop.description.no_mode: Type of looping can be **`%s`** only!
queue.empty: There are no tracks in queue. Please give me some music!
queue.restore: Bot has been restarted, tracks queue has been restored.
help.replay.description: Start a music queue from the beginning
error.effects.description.no_effect: Type of effects can be **`nightcore/karaoke`** only!
error.effects.description.no_mode.nightc: Type of modification for effect **Nightcore** can be **`%s`** only!
error.effects.description.no_mode.karaok: Type of modification for effect **Karaoke** can be **`%s`** only!
effects.apply.nightcore: Effect **Nightcore** activated with modification **%s**. Please wait a few seconds to apply this effect in current queue.
effects.apply.karaoke: Effect **Karaoke** activated with modification **%s**. Please wait a few seconds to apply this effect in current queue.
ping.title: Ping?
about.title: :thinking: Who am I?
about.description:
Hello! My name is **Sonata**! I was created by [%s](%s) over a cup of tea and eight hours of hard work at workspace.

> **What can I do?**
It's a good question. I can't do anything yet. :+1:
Ok, it's just a joke. You can check out my commands in `%shelp`.

My version: **%s**
Help with translation on another languages! **[`Click here for redirect to GitHub.`](https://github.com/vlfz/sonata-locales)**

Support the development of bot! Only one person is creating me! **[`Click here to redirect to DonationAlerts.`](https://sqdsh.top/donate-da)**
about.description.bonus.active: :blue_heart: Thanks for supporting developers! Now this server has bonuses!
about.description.bonus.inactive: :warning: After donating contact with developers in support server for bonus.
error.description.snapshot.incorrect_url: You didn't provide a valid URL!
error.description.snapshot.cannot_send_a: I can't send attachments to this channel!
error.description.snapshot.chromium_star: Chromium is starting up. Please, make your request later.
error.description.snapshot.internal_serv: ChromeChain request error. Please, contact with developers.
error.description.snapshot.undefined_err: Undefined error. Please, contact with developers.
error.description.demotivator.no_text: Specify at least some text for this command!
error.description.demotivator.text_limit: The length of the upper text must not exceed the character limit (**34**).
error.description.gta.no_text: Specify at least some text for this command!
error.description.gta.text_limit: The length of the upper text must not exceed the character limit (**45**).
success.title: %s Success!
error.title: %s An error has occurred!
error.description.spamMode:
On server **%s** anti-invite mode is enabled. üëâ üëà
You have **%s/%s warns**. Stop now, until it's not too late!
error.description.spamMode.banned:
On server **%s** anti-spam mode is enabled. Since you have **%s/%s warns**, i'm automatically gave you a ban on this server.
If you think that your activity was absolutely legal - fill out this form: https://sqdsh.top/bot_warn_appeal
error.description.spamMode.force_banned:
On server **%s** anti-spam mode is enabled. You are blacklisted for reason `%s`, so I automatically gave you a ban on this server.
If you think that your activity was absolutely legal - fill out this form: https://sqdsh.top/bot_warn_appeal
error.description.reason.spamMode: Spam on this or other servers
error.description.anti_invite: Sending invite links on this server is forbidden. üëâ üëà
error.description.anti_monitoring: This server is protected against links to bad monitoring servers/bots. üëâ üëà
error.description.no_permissions:
Sorry, but you are not allowed to use this command because you don't have permissions:
> **%s**
error.description.no_permissions_for_bot:
Sorry, but this command requires an additional permissions for the bot:
> **%s**
error.description.no_bonus:
Sorry, but you are not allowed to use this command because you must donate to developers (this is a donator function).
> More info: *`%sabout`*
error.description.no_prefix: Prefix cannot contain more than 8 characters.
error.description.badoo.no_set_channel: Type of settings can be **`%s`**! only
error.description.badoo.no_channel: Please provide a channel (mention or channel's ID).
error.description.no_warn_count: Count of acceptable warns may be **`only from 1 to 100`**.
error.description.no_color:
HEX-code is not provided, or HEX-code was incorrect.

> Maybe you forget type `#` to the beginning of the command.
> You can pick a color in this website: **[`www.color-hex.com`](https://www.color-hex.com)**
error.description.cooldown:
This command has a cooldown.!
> Try again in **%s**
error.description.stack_error:
An unexpected error has occurred! **I'm so sorry! >___<**
I have already sent information about error to my developers. It will be corrected soon.
error.description.stack_song_error:
An unexpected error has occurred during song playing! **I'm so sorry! >___<**
I have already sent information about error to my developers. It may well be corrected soon.
error.description.command_disabled: The command is disabled. Maybe it is in the process of implementation, or the developers are fixing a bug.
error.description.no_nsfw_channel: This command can be executed **only in NSFW-channels**!
error.play.description.not_connected: You must be in voice channel for command execution.
error.play.description.not_connected_to_: You must be in a voice channel with me!
error.play.description.no_args: Please, type the name or video URL from YouTube.
